alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:18PM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with isolated higher amounts of 12 to 14 inches in south eastern portions of the range. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, and the Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are expected, with slick roads and periods of low visibility. Travel may be especially difficult over Powder River Pass and Granite Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Backcountry enthusiasts including snowmobilers can easily become disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
